text: Chuck Williams (January 13, 1966 â€“ June 1, 2018) was an American professional wrestler. He was better known by his ring name, Rockin' Rebel. Williams was best known for his appearances on the U.S. independent circuit with promotions such as Eastern Championship Wrestling, Combat Zone Wrestling, Atomic Championship Wrestling, Classic Championship Wrestling, 1CW (Delaware) and Valour Pro Wrestling. Williams owned the trademark to his ring name. On June 1, 2018, police found a dead man and woman in a home in West Goshen Township, Pennsylvania. They said it appeared to be a murder-suicide. Williams was 52 years old. On June 3, West Goshen Township Police Department said it appeared he had shot his wife to death before shooting himself. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Rockin' Rebel on Facebook * Rockin' Rebel at OnlineWorldofWrestling.com * Rockin' Rebel at Bodyslamming.com * Rockin' Rebel at Cagematch.de Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Suicides by firearm in the United States Category:1966 births Category:2018 deaths
title: Rockin' Rebel
